main event: A witness observed a bright white light which seemed to pulse or flicker at irregular intervals in Union City, Indiana on 6 June 1960.
interesting points: The object was observed moving erratically in multiple directions,The light appeared to be 2 to 3 times as bright as a star,The sighting lasted for approximately 20 minutes,The witness reported that the object was flying very fast and made a concentration turn in the pattern as it passed overhead,The investigation concluded that the case remains UNIDENTIFIED.
sighted object: a bright white light in the sky
witness description: a male adult observed the object from outside his home
